title: Hanes Originals Cotton Joggers, Jersey Sweatpants for Men with Pockets, 30" Inseam
description: BASICS THAT ARE FAR FROM BASIC - A stylish collection of cool, modern essentials designed for comfort, made for every body. Be yourself in Hanes Originals.
COTTON-SOFT - 100% jersey cotton offers cloud-like comfort. Heathered styles are a cotton blend.
ADDED COMFORT - Regular men's fit with an elastic waistband for a virtually custom fit.
AMERICAN GROWN - Made with cotton sourced from U.S. farms.
DESIGN DETAILS - Convenient side pockets, tapered leg, and cuffed ankle lend to that classic men's jogger look.

Hanes Originals men’s joggers are made from jersey cotton sourced from American farms, which means you’ll get a comfy, soft feel wash after wash. In true jogger fashion, these sweats have an adjustable waistband for that no-matter-what kind of comfort. A tapered leg and cuffed ankle tie these men's joggers together, giving them that casual, cool look you love. The classic fit of these lightweight sweats offers a versatile style you can pair with your best Hanes hoodie or t-shirt.
